item.title: Hey AWTN Family, We have 2 more spots available for Summer...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

Hey AWTN Family, We have 2 more spots available for Summer Lunches. If you would like to volunteer or donate PLEASE sign up https://mealtrain.com/0484y9
#AWTN#SUMMERTIME#LUNCHES

item.title: Hello AWTN Family, Summertime is basically here. WE need your...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

Hello AWTN Family, Summertime is basically here.
WE need your HELP!!
We have some spots still open
PLEASE sign up https://mealtrain.com/0484y9
#AWTN#SUMMERTIME#LUNCHES

item.title: Hi AWTN Family, We are having our 1st Annual Towel Drive. The...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

Hi AWTN Family, We are having our 1st Annual Towel Drive. The shower trailer is hitting the street again. We need your help!!
#summertime#AWTN#Towels#ShowerTrailer

Check out other ways to get involved on http://www.aurorawarmsthenight.org/

item.title: Hello AWTN Family, Summertime is around the corning and WE need...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

Hello AWTN Family, Summertime is around the corning and WE need your HELP!! We are doing Summer Lunches and NEED volunteers!!! PLEASE sign up https://mealtrain.com/0484y9
#AWTN#SUMMERTIME#LUNCHES

item.title: We are closed this week after a positive COVID test with one of...
item.content:encoded: Aurora Warms the NightWe are closed this week after a positive COVID test with one of our staff. We are all getting tested now & will reopen ASAP.We are closed this week after a positive COVID test with one of our staff. We are all getting tested now & will reopen ASAP.
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: 2021 will undoubtedly be difficult for our homeless friends on...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

2021 will undoubtedly be difficult for our homeless friends on East Colfax, your generosity is a blessing. #homelessness #eastcolfax #donate #housing

9360 E Colfax Ave. Aurora, CO 80010

aurorawarmsthenight.org

Donate

item.title: Now more than ever the need to help our homeless population on...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

Now more than ever the need to help our homeless population on East Colfax is mounting. With the affects of COVID-19 only just beginning and the number of people we see on the streets growing, we must act now.

Funds to provide food, shelter and clothing for our East Colfax Community

flipcause.com

Its cold Be part of our homeless outreach

Funds to provide food, shelter and clothing for our East Colfax CommunityFunds to provide food, shelter and clothing for our East Colfax CommunityDonate
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: We are beginning to take sign ups for our winter outreach meals...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

We are beginning to take sign ups for our winter outreach meals again. Please share with your community so we can be sure to have meals for those folks who are living on the streets & in our local motels.

Meals Needed!

mealtrain.com

Meal Train Update for Aurora Warms the Night

Meals Needed!Meals Needed!
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: There's a blanket drive going on for AWTN. Please...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

There's a blanket drive going on for AWTN. Please contribute if you can! https://fb.watch/263MXk_tzL/

Cain Home Partners at Keller Williams Executives Realty

Drop off your blanket donations any Saturday in November or December in the Parking Lot of The Church Of Jesus Christ Latter Day Saints located at 3101 S. Flanders St Aurora Co 80013. Hope to see you there!
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: Our clothing store is up! The East Colfax t-shirts and hats are...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

Our clothing store is up!

The East Colfax t-shirts and hats are a tribute to our East Colfax neighborhood - 100% of the profits go to Aurora Warms the Night
https://www.bonfire.com/store/awtn/
